text: Rainer Brinkmann (born 9 January 1958) is a German politician of the Social Democratic Party of Germany (SPD). He is an SPD leader in the Lippe region, and was a member of the Bundestag from 1998 to 2002. == References == Category:1958 births Category:Living people Category:People from Lippe Category:Members of the Bundestag for North Rhine-Westphalia Category:Members of the Bundestag 1998–2002 Category:Social Democratic Party of Germany politicians Category:Members of the Bundestag for the Social Democratic Party of Germany
title: Rainer Brinkmann (politician)
